name: Sigil Valley
description:
this game has no ending. explore a tranquil moonscape, touch sculptures, learn their glyphic language and hear their songs.

wasd + mouse = move

left click / e = interact

h = hide/show cursor

space = jump

***************************************************************************

SPECIAL THANKS TO THOSE WHO CONTRIBUTED SCULPTURES TO THE MOONSCAPE:

'penguin' by @efimero

'wolf' by @kenruze

'mushroom' by @dontfightducks
